newsitem.title: USA: Mattel names Autolitano president international.
newsitem.headline: Mattel names Autolitano president international.

text.p: Mattel Inc Monday named Astrid Autolitano president of Mattel International, responsible for directing the company's marketing, sales and distribution activities in markets outside of the United States.
In a statement, Mattel said she will report to Bruce Stein, president-Mattel Worldwide.
Autolitano, 58, most recently served as executive vice president-Americas. She joined Mattel in 1966, and has held a number of positions during her 29-year tenure.
Autolitano succeeds Lindsey Williams, former president of Mattel International, who retired from the company last December.
